title: 22  Meeting Note
text:
22.1 Experimental Details

22.1.1 Soil Choice

Material model choice

Mohr-Coulomb Model
Hardening Mohr-Coulomb Model
Cyclic SANISAND Model

Young’s modulus and Poisson ratio
Critical State Properties
Nonlinear Parameters
cohesion and tensile properties
Cycllic strength parameters



22.1.2 Structure Choice

Rigid or Linear Elastic Material
Young’s modulus and Poisson ratio
Fatigue properties (SN Curve)
Hardness properties (BHN)



22.1.3 SSI Choice

Interface friction coefficient

Horizontal / Vertical

Modulus of subgrade reaction of soil

Horizontal / Vertical / Rotational




22.1.4 Loading Choice

Actuators

Static vs Cyclic

Vibrations

Forced vs Ambient FFT vs FDD and EFDD
For experimental investigation, means and location of excitation, the density of the measurement point grid, the sampling rate and the length of time window must be optimized for good quality results.
Forced:
good:

provides “scaled” results
excites all (broad) range of natural frequencies
known force and mass, which allows FE updating

bad:

artificial vibration required
first mode can be too low to be excited

Ambient:
good: - no artificial excitation

better for low frequency (large and complex structures) (need sensors of the force balance type instead of piezoelectric sensors) f <1 Hz
cheap (no shaker)
can be performed without embarrassing normal user (stopping traffic or humans)

bad:

lack of stationarity (not controllable). scatter may occur.
not all natural frequency may be excited
non-linearity of structure itself (assumption of cross section). small movements in different locations (GPSS technique to syncronize time)
requires long cables
requires reference points >1 (3D or 1D sensors)
Time window must be selected > 1000~2000 times f_n
requires manual techniques for FE updating



22.1.5 Software Choice

ABAQUS

UMAT implementation

Plaxis 3D
ARTeMIS Modal Pro

Operational Modal Analayis
Structural Health Monitoring

SAP 2000

natural frequency for 3D structure on Winkler foundation

title: 23  Proposal Details
text:
23.1 1차년도: 해상풍력발전기 고유진동수의 영향인자 분석

23.1.1 세굴영향 고유진동수 분석을 위한 정밀 수치모델링 기술 개발

23.1.1.1 지반물성값의 비선형성, 지반-지지구조 인터페이스, 풍력타워 구조체 등 시스템의 고유진동수를 정밀하게 모사하는 유한요소기반 수치모델링 기술 개발

To model natural frequency, solid element can be converted to beam elements, Boundary conditions can be applied as linear springs of soil stiffness. Interface properties are not needed.
For 3D modelling, only foundation can be modelled for application of static load. From load-displacement response, stiffness can be obtained, which can be used for calculation of natural frequency.



Physical domain effect:

2D axis-symmetric vs 3D

Boundary condition effect

size of soil box

Mesh quality analysis

aspect ratio, skewness, sensitivity, computational cost

Force method vs Displacement method
Initial soil stress

effect of compaction or dilation




23.1.1.2 세굴 깊이에 따른 지지력과 축방향 및 회전방향 지반강성 분석을 통해 고유진동수의 변화 확인
We must select important influence factors for natural frequency: f_n = \sqrt{\frac{K}{M}}.
Vesic (1961) provided a relationship between the modulus of subgrade reaction K, used in the Winkler spring problem and the material properties in the elastic continuum problem as

K = \frac{0.65 E_s}{(1-\mu^2_s)} \big( \frac{E_s D^4}{E_p I_p} \big)^{1/12}
 where E_s= soil modulus of elasticity;\mu_s= Poisson’s ratio of soil; D= diameter; and E_p I_p flexural rigidity of pile.
For circular footing embedded in stratum over bedrock, static stiffness of soil (DNV-OS-J101-2014 Table G-2) is given by: 
K_V = \frac{4GR}{1-\nu} (1+ 1.28 \frac{R}{H}) (1+ \frac{D}{2R}) (1+ (0.85  -0.28 \frac{D}{R})\frac{\frac{D}{H}}{1-\frac{D}{G}})

K_{soil} depends on the following parameters:

embedment depth \frac{D}{B}
depth to bedrock H
Elastic properties G, \nu
density of soil \rho
tower’s flexural rigidity EI

Check: - relationship between axial, horizontal, and rotational stiffness


dominance and interdependence or correlation




23.1.2 원심모형을 통한 석션기초 고유진동수의 세굴영향 분석

23.1.2.1 가속도, 변형률, 변위 등 다양한 결과를 이용한 고유진동수 측정방법 분석

accelerometers: perform modal analysis to get dynamic properties (modal shape, natural frequency, damping coeffieicent, etc)



strain gauge: wind frequency, fatigue analysis
displacement: mode shape verification, load-displacement curve -> stiffness -> natural frequency



23.1.2.2 지반, 석션기초(Mono, Tripod), 상부타워 모형체 및 하중재하 장치 제작

soil bed: soil raining technique (use KAIST automatic raining machine)
mono vs tripod
loading device: eccentric loading (wind only, wave only, wind+wave)




23.1.2.3 세굴깊이에 따른 지지력 변화, 고유진동수 민감도 분석 및 중요인자 결정


\frac{m_{nacelle}}{m_{tower}}
\frac{m_{tower}}{m_{soil}}
\frac{K_{tower}}{K_{soil}}
\frac{L_{tower}}{L_{soil}}





23.1.3 다양한 변수조건을 고려한 원심모형시험 수행

23.1.3.1 석션기초 제원(Mono, Tripod), 지반조건(모래, 점토), 풍력발전기 규모 등의 다양한 영향인자를 고려한 변수연구 수행

density of soil

silt: loose, medium, dense
sand: loose, medium, dense

size of wind turbine: 3MW or 10MW (scale effect)

scale effect may depend on non-homogeneity of material and rigidity of soil profile.

Variable cross section of tower structure
Mono vs Tripod: spacing

spacing influences changes in properties of equivalent-beam model




23.1.3.2 정밀 수치모델링 및 원심모형실험 결과와 비교하여 적용성 검증 및 고도화

comparison with international standards: DNV and API equations
comparison with FE and centrifuge results
comparison with other researcher’s results

title: 23  Proposal Details
text:
23.2 2차년도: 고유진동수를 이용한 세굴안정성 평가기술 개발

23.2.1 세굴안정성 평가기술 검증 및 고도화

23.2.1.1 세굴깊이에 따른 지지력과 고유진동수 변화 분석
1 Comparison between static and dynamic soil parameters:

Dynamic earth pressure coefficient
Dynamic stiffness
Dynamic dashpot coefficient

2 Soil strength degradation due to cyclic loading

3 accumulation of plastic strain
4 correlation between ultimate resistance and natural frequency changes


23.2.1.2 해상풍력발전기의 현장 상시진동 계측자료를 이용한 건전도 및 성능평가로 현장 적용성 분석

white noise cancelling method



condition matrix




various statistical techniques for clear scour identification

title: 23  Proposal Details
section: 23.3 3차년도: 해상풍력 석션기초 세굴안정성 스마트 모니터링 기술 개발
text:
23.3 3차년도: 해상풍력 석션기초 세굴안정성 스마트 모니터링 기술 개발

23.3.1 세굴 안정성 최적 모니터링을 위한 현장 계측기술 개발

23.3.1.1 계측결과 피드백을 통한 고유진동수 상시점검 및 평가체계 구축

structural health monitoring 



23.3.1.2 고유진동수 평가시스템 기반의 풍력터빈 위해영역 평가기술 개발

damage detection algorithm with different scenarios






23.3.2 세굴 안정성 평가 매뉴얼 개발

23.3.2.1 원심모형실험/수치해석 결과를 이용한 세굴안정성 평가지표 개발

health index using Chi square Hypothesis Test



Probabilistic analysis




23.3.2.2 다양한 운영 시나리오를 고려한 세굴안정성 평가 매뉴얼 개발

check international standards
